text: Agar woh tumhare saath nikalte to tumhare andar kharabi ke siwa kisi cheez ka izafa na karte, woh tumhare darmiyan fitna pardazi ke liye daud-dhoop karte, aur tumhare giroh ka haal yeh hai ke abhi usmein bahut se aisey log maujood hain jo unki baatein kaan laga kar sunte hain, Allah in zaalimon ko khoob jaanta hai
